goThere

public boolean goThere(de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.xmpp.beans.XMPPBean bean)
Go there. Is invoked by the PlayerPacketListener if a goThereIQ arrived. It shows the the player where his team mate wants him/her to go.

Parameters:
bean - the bean
Returns:
true, if successful

public boolean keepAlive()
Keep alive. Is invoked by the PlayerPacketListener when a keepAliveIQ arrives and signalizes that the client is online.

true, if successful
